definition[0]: the period when someone is king, queen, or emperor
example[0]: changes that took place during Charlemagneâ€™s reign
definition[1]: the period when someone is in charge of an organization, team etc
example[2]: during his reign at the Education Department
definition[2]: a period during which something is the most powerful or most important feature of a place
example[3]: the reign of Stalinism in Russia
definition[3]: to rule a nation or group of nations as their king, queen, or emperor
example[5]: Pharaohs reigned over Egypt for centuries.
definition[4]: if a feeling or quality reigns, it exists strongly for a period of time
example[7]: Silence reigned while we waited for news.
